fields.name: INVALID_CHUNK_POS
javadoc: Value representing an absent or invalid chunkpos

methods.name: asLong
javadoc: Converts the chunk coordinate pair to a long

methods.name: getMaxBlockX
javadoc: Get the last world X coordinate that belongs to this Chunk

methods.name: getMaxBlockZ
javadoc: Get the last world Z coordinate that belongs to this Chunk

methods.name: getMinBlockX
javadoc: Get the first world X coordinate that belongs to this Chunk

methods.name: getMinBlockZ
javadoc: Get the first world Z coordinate that belongs to this Chunk

methods.name: getRegionLocalX
javadoc: Gets the x-coordinate of this chunk within the region file that contains it.

methods.name: getRegionLocalZ
javadoc: Gets the z-coordinate of this chunk within the region file that contains it.

methods.name: getRegionX
javadoc: Gets the x-coordinate of the region file containing this chunk.

methods.name: getRegionZ
javadoc: Gets the z-coordinate of the region file containing this chunk.
